name: La Reliquia
overview: You are a member of a religious community. After a long journey to the Holy Land, you return to your monastery of Saint Camilo to find that it is overrun by unholy creatures and all your brothers have disappeared! There is no doubt that the sacred relic protected by your order has been stolen. You will have to face numerous creatures through 39 screens, each more devious than the last. Your character is peaceful and you can only rely on your jumps to progress. Will you be up to the challenge?
